videoJson.name: Pixelvision
videoJson.fact1: These camcorders recorded low resolution audio and video onto standard music audio cassettes
videoJson.fact2: This format was sold as a toy camcorder produced by Fisher-Price in 1987; it was on the market for only one year with about 400,000 units produced in total
videoJson.fact3: This format records the video track information on the left channel of the audio cassette and the audio track is stored on the right
